name: Date in the Dungeon
description:
Date in the Dungeon

Created by: Nuria Muñoz Bueno
Music: YouFulca (Wingless-seraph.net)

Co-op platform game, where each character has different abilities
Rita and Zak will enter the dungeon as a test of trust and love.

Controls:

  • Zak
    Movement: WASD
    Action: Q
    He is stronger than Rita, being able to move heavy objects, although he is less agile than her.
  • Rita
    Movement: Arrow keys
    Action: 0 (Zero)
    She is more agile than Zak, being able to jump higher and to wall jump

- If Zak crouches and Rita jumps next to him, Zak will help her jump even higher.
